name: Busloop
description:
Busloop is a short 3D first person game with soft horror elements.

Waking up in a bus, with not so clear memory, the player has to get out to go home.
What seems to be an easy task will not be so simple, is that even a real bus?

Features
  • 30 minutes of gameplay
  • 2 Languages (English and Italian)
  • 4 Mini-games
  • 1 Puzzle
  • Light jumpscares (audio is adjustable)
  • Mystery to solve
Gameplay

The gameplay is quite basic, you have to explore the bus to gain clues (Memory Shards), once
you collect enough, you will be able to unlock a memory by winning a mini-game, once unlocked, you will be able to view the memory in your menu.

Still unsure what is the game about?
You can view more information about it below or simply download a demo (est. 5 minutes of gameplay) which is useful to understand what is the game about and if your computer can run the game properly.
